summary: Connect refers to establishing and enhancing relationships. It involves alignment and strategic planning for self-growth, resilience, and resource acquisition. Through SWOT analysis, personal strength identification, and networking, one can bolster personal and professional connections. No related articles or profiles are available at this moment, but the course offered explores how to 'Align the Misaligned,' focusing on personal development and strategic networking.
excerpt: Discover personal strengths, embrace weaknesses, and use SWOT analysis to clarify positions. Formulate critical asks to improve strategic networking and resource acquisition.
